ygData.subject: RE: Missing bard songs (was Updated Song Analysis 21+)
ygData.msgSnippet: [snip] ... I remember reading a post from Brad McQuaid a couple of months ago.  He said they were uncertain whether they would extend the cap to 60 - and give
ygData.messageBody:
[snip]

> Other than that I can't see what they have in mind. There is
> little need
> for an upgrade to most of our existing songs, upgrade to hymn highly
> unlikely to ever occur. I still greatly doubt that a high
> level binding
> song would be unbalancing. Given the lack of knowledge other
> classes have
> about bards, if it was self only most people would never even know it
> existed.
>
> Kitasi

I remember reading a post from Brad McQuaid a couple of months ago. He said
they were uncertain whether they would extend the cap to 60 - and give new
skills, abilities, with each level -or- extend it to level 75 and break-up
the enhancments (I personally think they should go to level 75). He also
hinted at the idea of classes being able to borrow certain skills and
abilities from other classes (like being able to bind, etc).

It's going to be weird when the expansion comes... it will be interesting to
see how they handle it. Obviously, a lot of combat related stats are going
to have to be tweeked. With the current caps, there is no way that a group
could tackle a level 75 MOB (our dodge skill is going to be sooooo pathetic
in awhile - unless it gets raised).

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 31 Bard [Povar]
